markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Emotional Partitions](/Feats.aspx?ID=3964) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Kashrishi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=462" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 43

</column>

---

You have created strong mental partitions in your mind to filter out negative emotional influences. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus on saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects. If you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Emotional Partitions
